summary.span: 表示用于填充 和更新 SQL Server 数据库的一组数据命令和一个数据库连接。

span.span: Represents a set of data commands and a database connection that are used to fill the and update a SQL Server database.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ，用作之间的桥梁和用于检索和保存数据的 SQL Server。The , serves as a bridge between a and SQL Server for retrieving and saving data. 映射提供此桥的更改中的数据以匹配数据源中的数据和，其中更改要匹配中的数据的数据源中的数据，使用对数据源的相应 TRANSACT-SQL 语句。The provides this bridge by mapping , which changes the data in the to match the data in the data source, and , which changes the data in the data source to match the data in the , using the appropriate Transact-SQL statements against the data source. 在行的基础上执行更新。The update is performed on a by-row basis. 对于每个插入、 修改和删除的行，方法确定已对其执行的更改的类型 (`Insert`， `Update`，或`Delete`)。For every inserted, modified, and deleted row, the method determines the type of change that has been performed on it (`Insert`, `Update`, or `Delete`). 具体取决于的更改，类型`Insert`， `Update`，或`Delete`命令模板执行传播到数据源已修改的行。Depending on the type of change, the `Insert`, `Update`, or `Delete` command template executes to propagate the modified row to the data source. 当填充，如果不存在创建必要的表和列返回的数据。When the fills a , it creates the necessary tables and columns for the returned data if they do not already exist. 但是，主键信息不包含在隐式创建的架构除非属性设置为。However, primary key information is not included in the implicitly created schema unless the property is set to . 你可能还有创建的架构，包括主键信息、 使用数据填充它之前`FillSchema`。You may also have the create the schema of the , including primary key information, before filling it with data using `FillSchema`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[将现有约束添加到数据集](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Adding Existing Constraints to a DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md). 结合使用和来提高性能时连接到 SQL Server 数据库。 is used in conjunction with and to increase performance when connecting to a SQL Server database. > [!NOTE] > 如果您要通过 SQL Server 存储过程使用 `DataAdapter` 来编辑或删除数据，请确保不要在存储过程定义中使用 SET NOCOUNT ON。If you are using SQL Server stored procedures to edit or delete data using a `DataAdapter`, make sure that you do not use SET NOCOUNT ON in the stored procedure definition. 这将使返回的受影响的行数为零，`DataAdapter` 会将其解释为并发冲突。This causes the rows affected count returned to be zero, which the `DataAdapter` interprets as a concurrency conflict. 在这种情况下，将引发 。In this event, a will be thrown. 还包括， ， ， ，和属性以便于加载和更新的数据。The also includes the , , , , and properties to facilitate the loading and updating of data. 实例时创建读/写属性设置为初始值。When an instance of is created, the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ， ，和是泛型的模板，将自动填入从每个已修改的行的各个值通过参数机制。The , , and are generic templates that are automatically filled with individual values from every modified row through the parameters mechanism. 为你传播到数据源每个列，应将参数添加到`InsertCommand`， `UpdateCommand`，或`DeleteCommand`。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to the `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. 属性对象应设置为列的名称。The property of the object should be set to the name of the column. 此设置指示参数的值未手动设置，但获取自当前处理的行中的特定列。This setting indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but is taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. > [!NOTE] > 如果，会发生调用方法和表包含在客户端计算机不可用的用户定义的类型。An will occur if the method is called and the table contains a user-defined type that is not available on the client computer. 有关详细信息，请参阅[创建和使用用户定义类型](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139492)SQL Server 联机丛书中。For more information, see [Creating and Using User-Defined Types](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139492) in SQL Server Books Online. ## Examples 下面的示例使用， ，和从数据库中选择记录并填充与所选的行。The following example uses the , , and to select records from a database and populate a with the selected rows. 实心随后会返回。The filled is then returned. 若要完成此操作，该方法传递初始化，连接字符串和是 TRANSACT-SQL SELECT 语句的查询字符串。To accomplish this, the method is passed an initialized , a connection string, and a query string that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现的构造函数集属性中指定的值`selectCommand`参数。This implementation of the constructor sets the property to the value specified in the `selectCommand` parameter. 实例时创建以下读/写属性设置为以下的初始值。When an instance of is created, the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values. |属性Properties|初始值Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 你可以更改任何通过单独属性调用这些属性的值。You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property. 当（或任何其他命令属性） 分配到以前创建、不克隆。When (or any of the other command properties) is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 保留以前创建的引用对象。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现的打开和关闭如果尚未打开。This implementation of the opens and closes a if it is not already open. 这很有用的应用程序必须调用中方法为两个或多个对象。This can be useful in an application that must call the method for two or more objects. 如果是已打开，你必须明确地调用**关闭**或**释放**以将其关闭。If the is already open, you must explicitly call **Close** or **Dispose** to close it. 实例时创建以下读/写属性设置为以下的初始值。When an instance of is created, the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values. |属性Properties|初始值Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 你可以更改通过单独属性调用这些属性的值。You can change the value of either of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间，如果未设置此属性和主键信息位于、可以自动生成，如果你设置属性和使用。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the property and use the . 然后，你未设置任何其他命令都由。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the . 此生成的逻辑需要要中存在的键列信息。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 当分配到以前创建、不克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 保留以前创建的引用对象。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. 为你传播到数据源每个列，应将参数添加到`InsertCommand`， `UpdateCommand`，或`DeleteCommand`。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to the `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. `SourceColumn`参数的属性应设置为列的名称。The `SourceColumn` property of the parameter should be set to the name of the column. 这指示参数的值未手动设置，但获取自当前处理的行中的特定列。This indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but is taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和设置， ， ，和属性。The following example creates a and sets the , , , and properties. 它假定你已创建对象。It assumes you have already created a object. Public Custom Event RowUpdated As SqlRowUpdatedEventHandler

summary.span: 在对数据源执行命令后的 过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during after a command is executed against the data source.

summary.span: 尝试进行更新，因此激发了该事件。

span.span: The attempt to update is made, so the event fires.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时，有两个事件发生每个更新的数据行。When using , there are two events that occur per data row updated. 执行顺序如下所示：The order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值移动到的参数值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 3. 该命令执行。The command executes. 4. 如果该命令设置为`FirstReturnedRecord`，第一个返回结果将放置在。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果没有输出参数，它们都将置于。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 7. 调用 。 is called. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何同时使用和事件。The following example shows how to use both the and events. 事件返回下面的输出：The event returns this output: 事件参数: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType = 2 状态 = 0)event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType=2 status=0) 事件返回下面的输出：The event returns this output: 事件参数: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType = 2 recordsAffected = 1 row=System.Data.DataRow[37] 状态 = 0)event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType=2 recordsAffected=1 row=System.Data.DataRow[37] status=0) [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowUpdating As SqlRowUpdatingEventHandler

summary.span: 在对数据源执行命令前的 过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during before a command is executed against the data source.

summary.span: 尝试进行更新，因此激发了该事件。

span.span: The attempt to update is made, so the event fires.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时，有两个事件发生每个更新的数据行。When using , there are two events that occur per data row updated. 执行顺序如下所示：The order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值移动到的参数值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 3. 该命令执行。The command executes. 4. 如果该命令设置为`FirstReturnedRecord`，第一个返回结果将放置在。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果没有输出参数，它们都将置于。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 7. 调用 。 is called. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何同时使用和事件。The following example shows how to use both the and events. 事件返回下面的输出：The event returns this output: 事件参数: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType = 2 状态 = 0)event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType=2 status=0) 事件返回下面的输出：The event returns this output: 事件参数: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType = 2 recordsAffected = 1 row=System.Data.DataRow[37] 状态 = 0)event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType=2 recordsAffected=1 row=System.Data.DataRow[37] status=0) [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当分配到以前创建、不克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 保留以前创建的引用对象。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. 如果不返回任何行，没有表将添加到，并且不引发任何异常。If the does not return any rows, no tables are added to the , and no exception is raised. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和设置， ， ，和属性。The following example creates a and sets the , , , and properties. 它假定你已创建对象。It assumes you have already created a object. member this.UpdateBatchSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置每次到服务器的往返过程中处理的行数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows that are processed in each round-trip to the server.
The number of rows to process per-batch.

value.span:
值是 效果
0 批大小上没有任何限制...
1 禁用批处理更新。
>1 使用批发送更改一次的操作。
所有命令时将此值设置为 1 以外的值，与都关联必须具有其 * * UpdatedRowSource * * 属性设置为或。

span.span:
Value is Effect
0 There is no limit on the batch size..
1 Disables batch updating.
>1 Changes are sent using batches of operations at a time.
When setting this to a value other than 1, all the commands associated with the have to have their **UpdatedRowSource** property set to or .
An exception is thrown otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置一个值，该值启用或禁用批处理支持，并且指定可在一次批处理中执行的命令的数量。Gets or sets a value that enables or disables batch processing support, and specifies the number of commands that can be executed in a batch. 使用属性来更新数据源中的更改与。Use the property to update a data source with changes from a . 这可以通过减少服务器的往返次数来提高应用程序性能。This can increase application performance by reducing the number of round-trips to the server. 执行极大的批处理会降低性能。Executing an extremely large batch could decrease performance. 因此，在实现应用程序前应进行测试以得到最佳的批大小。Therefore, you should test for the optimum batch size setting before implementing your application. 如果的值设置为一个数字，将引发小于零。An is thrown if the value is set to a number less than zero.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 Transact-SQL 语句或存储过程，用于更新数据源中的记录。

span.span: Gets or sets a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure used to update records in the data source.

value.span: 在 过程中使用的 ，用于在数据库中更新对应于 中已修改行的记录。

span.span: A used during to update records in the database that correspond to modified rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间，如果未设置此属性和主键信息位于、可以自动生成，如果你设置属性和使用。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the property and use the . 然后，你未设置任何其他命令都由。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the . 此生成的逻辑需要要中存在的键列信息。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 当分配到以前创建、不克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 保留以前创建的引用对象。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. > [!NOTE] > 如果执行此命令返回行，更新的行可能会与合并具体取决于你如何设置**UpdatedRowSource**属性对象。If execution of this command returns rows, the updated rows may be merged with the depending on how you set the **UpdatedRowSource** property of the object. 为你传播到数据源每个列，应将参数添加到`InsertCommand`， `UpdateCommand`，或`DeleteCommand`。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. `SourceColumn`参数的属性应设置为列的名称。The `SourceColumn` property of the parameter should be set to the name of the column. 这指示参数的值不是手动设置，而来自当前处理的行中的特定列。This indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和设置， ，和属性。The following example creates a and sets the , , and properties. 它假定你已创建对象。It assumes you have already created a object. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command/VB/source.vb#1)]
